input_query:
TASK: You need to schedule a meeting for Brian and Margaret for half an hour between the work hours of 9:00 to 17:00 on Monday. 

Here are the existing schedules for everyone during the day: 
Brian has no meetings the whole day.
Margaret has blocked their calendar on Monday during 9:00 to 9:30, 10:00 to 10:30, 12:00 to 14:30, 15:30 to 17:00; 

Margaret can not meet on Monday after 14:00. Find a time that works for everyone's schedule and constraints.
